channel.title: DestinationPK Delta
channel.description:
Hi guys on moparscape.
I'm new on this and this is the first server i coded good its oldschool some people like it and its a good beginning to start.
I made a pk server its oldschool but i costummed some items so there is vesta longsword vesta spear statius warhammer etc in the game.
i made the home at the varrock church its a different place than at the onther servers hope u like it.
some things are mayby a little overpowered but that things i putted in the PkPoint Shop. there is a admim+ shop for admins/owners
[url=http://postimg.org/image/qod3k1uut/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/qod3k1uut/Destination_PK_Client_Admin_PKPoints_Shop.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/pefa5012t/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/pefa5012t/Destination_PK_Client_Barrows_Shop.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/hvw4wd9px/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/hvw4wd9px/Destination_PK_Client_FFA_room.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/gd0qre35h/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/gd0qre35h/Destination_PK_Client_Home.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/lqziyxsvp/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/lqziyxsvp/Destination_PK_Client_PVP_Outside.png[/img][/url]
[url=http://postimg.org/image/9ewmlg511/][img]http://s2.postimg.org/9ewmlg511/Destination_PK_Client_Shops.png[/img][/url]
Hope u like the pics if you got tips for a beginner i like to have them.
Credits 50% Frostiescape source 50% me
DestinationPK Server+Client Download Link http://www.mediafire.com/?1ivwcdsb66t6v7q
Comments are welcome if u have tips for the next source write it down and i take it for the next source.
-Topless
Want to contact me add me on Skype: Ragepattient

item.title: DestinationPK Delta

Loveandpower:

That isn’t an excuse. It’s better to do something unique cause then you are learning on your own

Thanks for the advice

item.title: DestinationPK Delta
item.dc:creator: @topless topless
item.description:
@topless wrote:

[quote=“Host Gushers, post:5, topic:518629”][quote author=topless link=topic=636895.msg4294243#msg4294243 date=1367925052]

Euhm, what did you actually add on this?

Looks like one of the Delta sources from like 2009, with those (in my opinion) ugly chatboxes.

i changed the home costumed items like vls stats hammer changed prices changed str bonuses added new stuff into the shops etc.
[/quote]
All of that is basic stuff, have u added anything that is “New” ?[/quote]

nope i’m a beginner so i can’t code much

Read full topic
